verse 1
yeah relax that shit you talk
before i sick my ha bitch on you thatll bounce with your dick on a fork ha
ill bring a bigger storm to calm your clouds ha

like how a pregnant woman breast milk leak through her blouse

now see every time we step in the place ha

and rob ice like i was never more able ha

and then i put my students all in a class ha

every time we drop that shit

verse 2
how many times you gon crush down somethin

before the hungry come and shop on your block ha

a thing of the past because them niggas stuck you all hoo
one shot bust and the same bullet struck you all
and when they bounce ha you hear voices screamin fuck you all

as decoys hoo in case they needed to duck you all ha
thats why you better move tight with your clique ha
niggas be thirsty and quick ha just to be off into the night with your shit
cmon we keep it street could give a damn who you are
make niggas wild and bitches spread hoo and put they hands on the car
now let me frisk em and shake they asses ha down to the floor
one dude wonderin ha what them niggas is poundin me for
what them niggas grillin what them niggas houndin me for
before the poundin what them niggas was surroundin me for huh
well let me tell you ha what the fuck we was surroundin you for for
we came to get you once ha but now i come to get you for more more
and while they gettin got ha niggas drinkin tendollarhennies a shot
gettin drunk and wildin out in the spot out in the spot
